title: T20 World Cup: India's worrying batting patterns and struggles vs off-spin
content: India have won all four group-stage matches at the T20 World Cup, but cracks have emerged, particularly against off-spin in the middle overs. Fixed batting roles and slow scoring by Suryakumar Yadav and Tilak Varma have hurt momentum, giving opponents a clear blueprint. Rivals like South Africa will target this weakness, and India must urgently address their middle-overs approach ahead of the Super Eights.

title: Explained: What is India‚Äôs Sarvam AI model that Google CEO Sundar Pichai is impressed with
content: Google CEO Sundar Pichai lauded Sarvam AI for its groundbreaking work in developing AI models tailored for Indian languages and contexts. The startup's AI reportedly outperforms major global models like Gemini and ChatGPT in specific benchmarks, showcasing advanced capabilities in visual understanding and document analysis for India's diverse linguistic landscape.

title: ‚ÄòCultural insensitivity‚Äô: Mamata slams PM Modi over ‚ÄòSwami‚Äô prefix to Ramakrishna‚Äôs name
content: West Bengal Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee has strongly criticized Prime Minister Narendra Modi for using the prefix 'Swami' for Sri Sri Ramakrishna Paramahamsadeva on his birth anniversary. Banerjee stated this displayed cultural insensitivity, as the saint was revered as 'Thakur,' with 'Swami' being a title for his disciples. Modi had earlier paid tributes to Swami Ramakrishna Paramahansa.

title: Ranji Trophy: J&K dare to dream under pressure ‚Äì A big leap long in the making
content: Jammu and Kashmir's remarkable journey to the Ranji Trophy final, marked by self-belief and meticulous planning, has transformed them into title contenders. Coach Ajay Sharma's patient approach and the development of a core group of talented young players, supported by improved infrastructure and pre-season exposure, have been pivotal to this success.

title: AI summit: Tata Sons' chair's expansion pitch, Google CEO‚Äôs ‚Äòvision‚Äô ‚Äî who said what
content: India is hosting the India-AI Impact Summit 2026, bringing together global leaders to discuss artificial intelligence. Discussions focused on democratizing AI, building sovereign capabilities, and ensuring inclusive growth. Leaders emphasized AI's transformative potential across sectors like healthcare and education. The summit highlighted India's growing role as a trusted AI hub in the Global South.

title: DMDK joins DMK-led alliance for Tamil Nadu polls; Premallatha Vijayakant meets Stalin
content: DMDK has officially joined the DMK alliance, marking its first partnership with the party since its inception in 2005. General secretary Premallatha Vijayakant confirmed the decision after meeting with Chief Minister M.K. Stalin. Seat-sharing discussions are ongoing, with a Rajya Sabha seat anticipated for DMDK.

title: Chatfishing: Is AI creeping into your dating life? Here's how to fix it
content: Online dating is facing a new challenge: chatfishing, where AI crafts messages for users. This trend, supported by studies, makes connections feel superficial and heartbreak harder to detect.  Experts advise quick transitions to voice or video calls to verify authenticity and prevent emotional deception.

title: Why Mark Zuckerberg's Meta new deal with Nvidia is 'bad news' for Intel and AMD
content: Meta is significantly boosting its partnership with Nvidia, securing millions of the chipmaker's latest processors for its data centers. This extensive deal, covering both AI training and inference, also includes Nvidia's CPUs, traditionally Intel and AMD's territory. The move consolidates Meta's AI infrastructure, potentially impacting competitors and simplifying vendor management.

title: India vs SA: ‚ÄòBaby AB‚Äô Dewald Brevis unfazed by Varun Chakravarthy threat
content: India and South Africa gear up for a T20 World Cup Super 8 clash, with a key battle potentially involving Varun Chakravarthy and Dewald Brevis. title: Man who 'sold' the Taj Mahal: The strange, audacious life of India‚Äôs most legendary conman
content: Mithilesh Kumar Srivastava, known as Natwarlal, was an extraordinary Indian trickster who became a synonym for deception. He masterfully used psychological brilliance and forged documents to pull off audacious scams, including allegedly selling iconic Indian landmarks. His ability to manipulate trust and authority made him an elusive legend.

title: Inside 'Jana Nayagan' actor's Rs 80-crore property
content: Thalapathy Vijay's opulent Neelankarai beachfront home, valued at Rs 70-80 crores, boasts modern coastal design with private amenities. Meanwhile, director H Vinoth expressed concern over the lack of support for his delayed film 'Jana Nayagan,' contrasting it with support for other controversial movies. Vijay's 'Theri' is set for a re-release.

title: 'You immigrant of Korean descent': US professor defends Indian-American visibility
content: A social media spat over Indian presence in Texas has ignited national debate. Commentators are discussing immigration, cultural shifts and belonging. The Dallas-Fort Worth area sees a growing Indian-American community. Concerns about rapid change are voiced, while others highlight the benefits of diversity. Discussions touch on economic impacts and the need for nuanced understanding of immigrant contributions.

title: Salim Khan hospitalization: Salman leaves hospital after checking on his father; avoids media
content: The entertainment world is on edge as veteran writer Salim Khan is hospitalized due to a minor brain hemorrhage. Salman Khan, his beloved son and superstar, was seen exiting Lilavati Hospital earlier today after spending time with his father in the ICU. Although Salim requires a ventilator, doctors believe he is on the path to recovery.

title: ‚ÄòTicked all the boxes‚Äô: Suryakumar sends Super 8s warning after dominant run

He highlighted that the team has "ticked almost all the boxes" and is ready for the Super 8s, citing Shivam Dube's crucial innings and the team's bowling flexibility as key strengths.

title: Hardik Pandya shares intimate birthday post for girlfriend Mahieka
content: Hardik Pandya shared a birthday post for girlfriend Mahieka Sharma, calling her ‚Äúmy princess.‚Äù He confirmed their relationship in late 2025 after divorcing Natasa Stankovic. title: Stock market today: Nifty50 opens above 25,850; Sensex up over 100 points
content: Stock market today: Indian equity benchmarks are slowly inching upwards, with Nifty50 and BSE Sensex opening in green after three days of gains. While Nifty50 was above 25,850 in early trade, BSE Sensex rose over 100 points.

title: 'He's a murderer': Wasim‚Äôs ex-wife seeks help from PM Sharif, Naqvi

She shared posts, videos, and messages claiming emotional and physical trauma and called him a ‚Äúmurderer.‚Äù Ashfaq urged a boycott of Islamabad United and requested an investigation by Pakistan‚Äôs PM and PCB chief.

title: ‚ÄòWhen friends connect‚Äô: French President Macron shares AI image with PM Modi
content: French President Emmanuel Macron visited India and met Prime Minister Narendra Modi. He shared an AI-generated image of the two leaders. Macron attended the AI Impact Summit in New Delhi. The summit focused on responsible and development-focused AI. India is hosting the global AI gathering. Leaders discussed AI's future and its impact on people, planet, and progress.

title: ‚ÄòDo not give away Diego Garcia‚Äô: Trump cautions UK amid US-Iran tensions
content: US President Donald Trump urged the UK not to "give away" the Diego Garcia base, deeming it crucial for potential US military action against Iran. This statement contradicts official US policy, which supports Britain's agreement to transfer sovereignty of the Chagos Islands to Mauritius while retaining a 100-year lease on the base.

title: Left Pakistan, became hero for Canada: How cricket found Saad Bin Zafar
content: Saad Bin Zafar moved from Pakistan to Canada in 2004 for education, with cricket initially just a hobby. After years of inconsistency, he became a key player and leader for Canada, helping regain ODI status and starring in the 2026 T20 World Cup. Balancing studies, jobs, and cricket, he eventually went full-time in 2018.

title: Smoke in cockpit, engine failure: JetBlue flight makes emergency landing in New Jersey
content: A JetBlue flight bound for West Palm Beach returned to Newark Liberty International Airport shortly after takeoff Wednesday due to an engine problem that caused smoke in the cockpit. The aircraft landed safely, and passengers and crew evacuated via slides. The incident led to a temporary flight suspension and delays.

title: Is the gym helping or harming your joints? Here's what doctor says
content: Gym culture often glorifies effort, leading many to ignore injuries as 'normal' or a sign of weakness. Social media's portrayal of perfect workouts exacerbates this, with individuals copying advanced routines without considering their own limitations. Experts warn that poor form, overtraining, and neglecting rest can lead to significant joint damage, emphasizing that pain signals a problem, not a challenge.

title: 'Hum dispresan mein hain': Memes storm internet after Babar Azam demoted against Namibia
content: Babar Azam faced online backlash during Pakistan's T20 World Cup match against Namibia, not getting a chance to bat. Despite being a key player, his recent form has been questioned. Team management opted for aggressive batters ahead of him, sparking fan criticism and memes about his role and the team's strategy.

title: Amit Shah skips SIR talk in Matua outreach at West Bengal event
content: Home Minister Amit Shah visited Mayapur, the birthplace of the Bhakti movement, to highlight the Matua community's role in unifying Hindu society. He praised reformers Harichand and Guruchand Thakur for their social welfare initiatives and described Bhaktisiddhanta Saraswati as a bridge to modernity. Shah conveyed PM Modi's greetings, emphasizing the spread of the 'Viksit Bharat' and Sanatan dharma messages globally.

title: Ramadan overtime work rules in UAE: Get 25% above normal hourly wage & more
content: UAE private sector employees now enjoy a two-hour daily reduction in working hours during Ramadan, a legal right for all regardless of faith. This adjustment supports work-life balance and respects the physical demands of fasting. While most benefit, some roles have exemptions and overtime rules ensure fair compensation for extra work.

title: AI Impact Expo extended till Saturday amid security curbs, but closed to public today
content: The AI Impact Expo has been extended to Saturday due to strict security for global leaders on Thursday. This allows more visitors to experience exhibits after access restrictions are lifted. While Wednesday saw smooth operations and high footfall, Thursday's diplomatic engagements necessitate tight controls. The expo now balances international diplomacy with public engagement.

title: 'Take a single? Unbelievable': Irfan Pathan slams Sahibzada Farhan's approach despite ton
content: Sahibzada Farhan achieved a maiden T20I century against Namibia in the T20 World Cup 2026. While reaching the milestone, his approach in the closing moments drew criticism from Irfan Pathan, who felt the team's total should have been prioritized. Despite this, Farhan's unbeaten 100 helped Pakistan post 199/3, leading to a dominant 102-run victory.

title: Rampage livestream erupts as Deen gets hit twice
content: A late-night house party hosted by former UFC star Quinton ‚ÄúRampage‚Äù Jackson turned chaotic after a physical fight broke out between retired MMA fighter Tiki Ghosn and streamer Deen The Great. The confrontation was streamed live. The clips of the party went viral on social media. Viewers watched as a verbal argument escalated in front of guests.

title: Golden State lands $60M Celtics center, ends Giannis pursuit
content: The Golden State Warriors have acquired Kristaps Porzingis from the Atlanta Hawks, trading away Jonathan Kuminga and Buddy Hield. This move aims to bolster the frontcourt and scoring after Jimmy Butler's season-ending injury. While Porzingis offers valuable spacing and shooting, his durability remains a significant concern for the team's playoff aspirations.

title: Pahalgam attack fallout: CRPF sets up 43 temporary bases in J&K
content: Following the Pahalgam terror attack, CRPF established 43 temporary operating bases in Jammu and Kashmir, situated at 6,000 feet and above. These bases, housing 16-25 personnel, are crucial for tracking and eliminating terrorists in higher reaches, utilizing specialized equipment for prolonged operations.

title: Allu Arjun's Hyderabad Mansion: Design meets luxury; 8,000 sq ft home in Jubilee Hills
content: Allu Arjun's Rs 100 crore Jubilee Hills mansion is a stunning, minimalist, all-white 'box-shaped' home. Spanning 8,000 sq ft on two acres, it features sunlit living spaces, a cozy family area, and a modern kitchen. The property also boasts vibrant children's rooms and a relaxing poolside, reflecting the 'Pushpa' star's love for peaceful, stylish living.

title: Ryan Williams, 19, announces engagement to Alexis Hill, 25
content: Alabama wide receiver Ryan Williams, 19, announced his engagement to 25-year-old Alexis Hill on Valentine‚Äôs Day. Hill, who has one child from a previous relationship, shared photos of her ring on Instagram. NFL insider Dov Kleiman reported the news on X, leading to mixed reactions online. title: Olympic men's hockey daily: Semifinal matchups are set
content: three out of four quarterfinal matchups in the 2026 Olympic men's hockey tournament went to overtime . the top four seeds all move on, with both semifinal games scheduled for Friday . no. 1 seed Canada vs. No. 4 seed Finland, 10:40 a.m. OT winner sends U.S. into hockey semis .

title: How to bet the Genesis Invitational: What to look for in the return to Riviera
content: the Genesis Invitational is back at Riviera Country Club after last year's detour to Torrey Pines . I'm targeting players who can create birdie looks with approach shots, save themselves when they miss the greens and actually capitalize on momentum . most top 20s are juiced, and I rarely step into Top 10 unless there is a real ceiling case .

title: Draft prospects with a true Round 1 grade: 11 players who are clear first-rounders
content: the average draft class has roughly 15 players who are deemed "first-round talents" a player would have been a first-rounder in each of the past five classes . the 2026 class actually has fewer players at the moment .

title: 'I'd rather retire': Caitlin Clark reacts to LeBron James giving up cookies and wine
content: leBron James says he just wants to live and doesn't know if he'll play for a 24th season . the los Angeles lakers star said he would abstain from desserts and alcohol altogether . he revealed that once the month ended, he decided to continue the fast through December .

title: Which teams nailed the portal? The best additions for each top 25 team
content: the 2025 season offered the ultimate proof that elite portal recruiting can put a program in national championship contention . the offseason transfer window has officially closed with more than 3,200 FBS scholarship players making moves in January . here's a look at the key portal pickups to know for each Way-too-Early Top 25 team .

title: Fly high, free bird! Postgame takeaways, grades and more from Team USA's OT thriller
content: two of the first three quarterfinal games of the 2026 Olympic men's hockey tournament went to overtime . team USA entered the event with the second-best gold medal odds, behind canada . Quinn Hughes scored a game-winning goal in 3-on-3 overtime to advance to the semifinal round .

title: India signs UN statement on West Bank
content: more than 100 countries and international organisations condemn Israel's efforts to consolidate control over the west bank . india endorsed the statement late on Wednesday, just before the deadline for joint condemnation lapsed . the statement comes ahead of PM Narendra Modi's visit to Israel next week .
